name: Castle Ravenstein
description:
Castle Ravenstein is a 3D puzzle platformer game where you learn about basic human anatomy, and solve puzzles with a unique 3 part movement system.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your name is Bonevard Raveinstein, you’ve been dead for decades, but you awaken in the rundown graveyard of your family, in the distance there is a loud ruckus. What has happened here, who is responsible for this?

Solve puzzles, gather and learn about your organs, and Defeat your evil nephew... Dr. Ravenstein.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The purpose of This game is to teach our target group(12 year-olds and up) the functionality of your most important organs, such as the heart, lungs, kidneys, and so on.
And the games voicelines and subtitles are in English for the learning aspect, so this game could be used in a classroom setting for subjects such as basic human anatomy and English.
